title: City life
brief_description: A light-hearted sketch of life in the city of Sydney. The hazards of driving and parking a car in the city area and the people in Hyde Park are seen against a background of light music. No narration.
description: A light-hearted sketch of life in the city of Sydney. The hazards of driving and parking a car in the city area and the people in Hyde Park are seen against a background of light music. No narration.
